Back to Franz Liszt

Franz Liszt

Trauervorspiel und Trauermarsch, S. 206

1885 · LW A334 · R. 84

[IMSLP]

Total duration: 7'

  • 1. Trauervorspiel
  • 2. Trauermarsch

Recommended editions

  • New Liszt Edition (Editio Musica Budapest) · I/12 · Z. A/B 6217 · Individual Character Pieces II · ed. Imre Mező / Imre Sulyok

1. Trauervorspiel

This piece also exists in a different version with a slightly shorter ending, the Preludio funebre (S. 205b; R. 83).

Duration: 1' 30"

Difficulty: 2

2. Trauermarsch

Another version of this piece is Teleki László from the Historische ungarische Bildnisse (S. 205; LW A335; R. 112). Both use a theme from a piece by Mihály Mosonyi: Gyászhangok Széchényi István halálára.

Duration: 5' 30"

Difficulty: 3
